data.name: Cave Confectioner
data.detailed_description:
Feature List

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1827200/RSOD/


About the Game



Cave Confectioner is a back-to-the-land farming and cooking RPG. Farm crops, discover new recipes, fight wild animals, and get to know the locals.

Explore an open world

Go almost anywhere, interact with almost anything, eat almost anything. The temperate climate makes crops grow fast and food plentiful.

Combine ingredients

An intuitive crafting system lets you at least attempt to combine everything with everything, whether or not the things go together. Combine natural ingredients with manmade things and fixtures of the world. Dozens of end products are formed by unique recipes, and only the correct combinations yield the goods.

Choose your own path

Craft things, sell foodstuffs to cave people, poke around and see how nature reacts. There is no "quest" or "mission" dialog box telling you where to go. Advancement is achieved through secrets and exploration.

Built to last

This developer has done the heavy lifting to give you a constant 60 FPS. A custom C++/OpenGL engine is used, Windows executables are built with MinGW, Linux executables are built against glibc 2.25 and tested on the latest versions of Ubuntu. There is no third-party proprietary software outside of Apple platforms. Anything that breaks is fixable.

data.short_description: You are a cave dweller with a massive appetite. Armed with only your wits, you set out to build a dessert empire. Collect, process, and combine ingredients. Cook over an open fire. Explore an open world in search of customers for your tasty treats.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or greater
  • Processor: x86 with SSE2 @ 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB video memory, shader model 4.0+
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or greater
  • Processor: x86-64 @ 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB video memory, shader model 4.0+
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.11+
  • Processor: x86-64 @ 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB video memory, OpenGL 3
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.11+
  • Processor: x86-64 @ 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB video memory, OpenGL 3
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Ubuntu 20.04 or equivalent
  • Processor: x86-64 @ 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB video memory, OpenGL 3
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires glibc >= 2.25
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Ubuntu 20.04 or equivalent
  • Processor: x86-64 @ 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB video memory, OpenGL 3
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
